DOC.brief_summary: We have found that biomarkers of long-term elevated dietary intake of omega-3 fatty acids such as DHA and EPA are inversely associated with severity of disease phenotype in STGD3 patients. Therefore, the purpose of this study is to follow STGD3 patients as they supplement their diets with DHA/EPA.
DOC.brief_title: DHA Supplementation in Patients With STGD3
DOC.criteria: All Moran Eye Center patients with STGD3 All others
